body: There is a "hump" on the comforPolygon in the adaptive comfort chart component: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/m7*E7RUk3WACzDDPIr3Hs0xmGQrX2SdRpLd6lJ4tRKQUCGKF9SSs6Wd0UduudqSBjg*knSeQMaEcq4Fvj3fNbDbBIilNNN0e/Image62.png) May I ask what this part of the polygon represents? The adaptive comfort chart in ASHARE2013 doesn't show such "hump"... [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/m7*E7RUk3WB3-SrzPWebIQlXFFH1VikxH0kgqulpcMvf95eBQzRFz9NahDCrOXk4O*0ADttvuQs*66xW5jVmcQ9RWSyvuiDb/Image61.png) Thank you very much!
topic: the "hump" on the comfortPolygon in the adpative comfort chart
